constraints.name: connectivity
constraints.description: 图必须连通，即所有敌军所在的格子必须通过空地格子相连

constraints.name: degree_bound
constraints.description: 每个空地格子最多与四个相邻的空地格子或障碍物格子相连

constraints.name: boundary_constraint
constraints.description: 敌军不能移动出地图边界

constraints.name: exclusion
constraints.description: 不能直接轰炸敌军所在的格子

constraints.name: minimization
constraints.description: 需要计算出阻止敌军所需的最少炸药数
